review: I had health issue so went to hospital. Doctor was good and it was convenient. I can recommend doctor to my family or friends. I am satisfied with the treatment given. Multi vitamin tablets was prescribed by the doctor. Blood report was checked. It was related to deficiency of vitamins, I had weakness. There was not much waiting time in the hospital. Staff were very cooperative. One concern was there, in hospital they told 1400 or 1000 rs has to be paid, but it practo it was RS 800 mentioned. Rs 200 was taken extra in hospital. I even gave feedback in practo app, doctor was good. It could be fixed charges and it can be checked and resolved. Doctor told breakfast is compulsory and told not to skip.

My husband had been to hospital as he was suffering from fever. ********* *** ********* ** *** ******* I can recommend doctor to my family or friends. I am satisfied with the treatment given. He explained nicely and gave good time for us, it was brilliant. Medicine was prescribed by the doctor. There was no waiting time in the hospital. Charges was expensive in the hospital, 200 rs for registration and 1000 rs consultation fees in this covid time as we know economy is slow currently and they need to look into fee structure. Hospitality was good.

I had met the doctor and it was for health problem. ********* *** *** **** ** *** ****** ** * ****** *** ******** *** ** ****** Medication was not started. Only medical tests was done. Only conversation was good. I am going through tuberculosis. I am not satisfied with treatment. I spent 30 to 40k which was not worth it. I am 35 percent fine with consultation. CT scan, blood test, bronscopy, other test was done and it took 15 days to complete all these tests. As treatment was not started I came to my home town Varanasi. Medication was not started as I was having fever. **** **** **** ** ***** ** ****** ** *** ******** Doctor told to have proteins. My infection was spreading from one lung to different lung so I am taking treatment from different doctor.
reply_text:
Greetings,

 Wish you all Health and faster 100% recovery.

Well you had come to me(Physician) and as per your medical history, Smoking history and Night working schedule history , you were Refferd to a chest specialist /Pulmonologist who did bronchoscopy and other chest related tests.

Few culture tests of Bronchoscopy takes 7-10 days to confirm the diagnosis.

You were under Pulmonologist and as far as I remember, You came to me to ask for a medical certificate so that you can show in your office for 2-3 months leave.

You didn't even wait for final reports and final treatment plan and went to your home town.

I will convey your queries to the Pulmonologist Dr Raj.

Wish you a healthy Lifestyle and health.

review: Doctor was friendly and cordial. I had to wait for 10-15 minutes as the doctor was busy but it was worth the wait.
Excellent interaction with Dr Himanshu Shekhar.  His practical approach and friendly manner provided assurance and comfort

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: ****  **** **** ******* very kind and polite. He explain everything very well The fees are not expensive.
